pr_title: CB-9053. Cleanup and update diagnostics bundle format + start using CDP doctor (CB-8865)

timeline.message:
CB-9053. Cleanup and update diagnostics bundle format
details:
- refactor cloud storage related parameters a bit (also fixes some issue)
- start using newer cdp-telemetry cli tool (include multiple workers feature, but use only 1 for those at the moment)
- update bundle to include bundle-info.json that contains required data that can be used by EDH
- include filecollector-metadata.json that includes the processing results
- rename bundle_info.json to diagnostics_request.json as that contains the diagnostics request data
- license id is not filled that
- include some new fields on the API (altohgh many of that are generated but as we passes those requests to internal endpoints, include those fields in the request)

CB-9053. Cleanup and update diagnostics bundle format + start using CDP doctor (CB-8865)
details:
- refactor cloud storage related parameters a bit (also fixes some issue)
- start using newer cdp-telemetry cli tool (include multiple workers feature, but use only 1 for those at the moment)
- update bundle to include bundle-info.json that contains required data that can be used by EDH
- include filecollector-metadata.json that includes the processing results
- rename bundle_info.json to diagnostics_request.json as that contains the diagnostics request data
- license id is not filled that
- include some new fields on the API (altohgh many of that are generated but as we passes those requests to internal endpoints, include those fields in the request)
- start using cdp-doctor -> use "cdp-doctor commands" to exercute multiple cdp-doctor calls and save its outputs under /tmp folder

CB-9053. Cleanup and update diagnostics bundle format + start using CDP doctor (CB-8865)
details:
- refactor cloud storage related parameters a bit (also fixes some issue)
- start using newer cdp-telemetry cli tool (include multiple workers feature, but use only 1 for those at the moment)
- update bundle to include bundle-info.json that contains required data that can be used by EDH
- include filecollector-metadata.json that includes the processing results
- rename bundle_info.json to diagnostics_request.json as that contains the diagnostics request data
- license id is not filled yet
- start using cdp-doctor -> use "cdp-doctor commands" to exercute multiple cdp-doctor calls and save its outputs under /tmp folder
- use different cdp-doctor commands for FreeIPA and CM based clusters (include recipe and scm agent related commands there)

timeline.author: attilapalfi92
attilapalfi92

replies.bodyText: it.is only used as a default if for some reason the blueprint/stack version for the cluster does not exist
replies.author: oleewere

replies.bodyText: but I cannot see it referenced anywhere
replies.author: attilapalfi92
